path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SlimeRoyale SCE Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens?
findings.description: The MINTER_ROLE may call mint several times in a day to create a huge number of tokens.

findings.title: A02.Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract has a potential vulnerability where an unauthorized user can upgrade the script.

findings.title: BPContract Function
findings.description: The BPContract function can be easily disabled anytime by the OWNER_ROLE user using the togglePreventBotMode function.

findings.title: Best-practice in `togglePreventBotMode` function
findings.description: The `togglePreventBotMode` function can be improved by allowing the `OWNER_ROLE` to pass the exact value instead of toggling it, which may lead to unintended consequences if not checked properly.

findings.title: The `MINTER_ROLE` may call mint several times in a day
findings.description: There is no constraint in the `mint` public function, allowing the `MINTER_ROLE` to call `mint` several times in a day and create a huge number of tokens.
